data.text: Spoke to networks in JHB to investigate this issue. Gordon confimed that speed is better now. In Future please make sure that Gordon speaks to Jared/Shaun in Networks before logging a speed related issue. He ws asked to do this when that network was configured but Jared never knew that there was an issue. @cobuspienaar @willemhuman @jakovanrensburg @yasserogier @sameerkumandan1 @stefanbar
